    • Method Detail

      • executeOpCode

        public void executeOpCode(int c0,
                 int c1,
                 int c2,
                 int c3)
        Executes a Chip-8 OpCode
        Parameters:
        c0 - The 1st 4 Bit of the opCode
        c1 - The 2nd 4 Bit of the opCode
        c2 - The 3rd 4 Bit of the opCode
        c3 - The 4th 4 Bit of the opCode

      • setRegister

        public void setRegister(int regNumber,
               int value)
        Sets a specific Register to a specific Value
        Parameters:
        regNumber - The Number of the Register
        value - The Value of the Register
